chickenGPT: Ferdinand the frog 🐸 croaked, "Chirpy! 10 PM! Medicine time!" Chirpy the chick 🐥 always obliged. But one night, Chirpy was too busy playing video games 🎮. Ferdinand, seeing the clock strike 10, hopped over. Chirpy, startled, squawked, "Ribbit! I forgot!" Suddenly, tiny feathers sprouted on Ferdinand. "Guess someone's getting a tadpole-sized cold 🤧!" Chirpy giggled.
